verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is holy ground,
We're standing on holy ground,
For the Lord is with us,
And where He is is holy;
This is holy ground,
We're standing on holy ground,
For the Lord is with us,
And where He is is holy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: These are holy hands, we're lifting up holy hands...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: These are holy lips, we're praising with holy lips...
